name: M8
description: M8 is an agency that helps brands and consumers connect in a Life On Screens™. We’re a team of creative, multicultural, multi-screen marketers who believe in combining storytelling, insights and technology to create meaningful interactions. M8 is headquartered in Miami, FL, with offices in New York City, Mexico City, Buenos Aires and Córdoba, Argentina. Our clients include KFC, Sprint, VISIT FLORIDA, Copa Airlines, Sony, Starwood Hotels & Resorts, Hertz, and other Fortune 500 brands.
